organisation_name: Bundesverband der Campingwirtschaft in Deutschland e.V. (BVCD)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: we have  12 Regional-Associations in 12 Federal States, total 1150 Campsites and Motorhomesites
relevant_communication:
BVCD- Betriebsvergleich für Campingplätze in Deutschland 2007 
BVCD-Campingführer 2005 to 2018 
Projekt: SOLCAMP EIE/05/149 
EUProjekt: Case EU China Matchmaking for Camping Facilities and Services- Asia-Invest-Program
goals__remit:
- Formulation an implementation of sector interests 
- Analysis and impact assesment of legislative policy 
-Introduction of industry-specific positions in legislative procedures 
- Specialised and contextual work on various areas of the camping industry e.g. in publications and studies 
-Cooperation in specialist fields of the German Tourism Association: „Camping & Caravaning“ and „Transport“ 
-Camping-Akademie Internal association training an seminars Caming-Academie 
and establishment of quality systems and initiatives in the camping industry 
-Enviromental orientation: establishment of quality and enviromental management of camping sites 
-Provision of important data and figures for the economical operation of an existing camping site or for the planning of a new camping site with BVCD‘s comparative study 
-Targeted PR in the interests of member companies 
-Presentation of the German camping facilities at tourism and camping trade fairs, both nationally and internationally 
-Targeted marketing via print and online media: e. g. BVCD Camping Guide, BVCD Camping App
